content: 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 20 k3 *k1 p2* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 21 k3 *p1 insert your rn into the hole under the horizontal strand 2 row below between the next 2 sts and pull up a loop of yarn yo k2tog tbl* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 22 k3 *k1 p2 sl1 purlwise wyif* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 23 k3 *p1 sl1 purlwise wyib k2 pass the slipped st over the first two sts on your rn* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 24 k3 k until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif this pattern is for personal use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way © agnes kroner 2025 aurelis scarf by aggie in stitches page 8 / 9 work row 1-24 three more times then work row 1-12 once more there are 9 sts on your needles including the 3 i-cord sts on each side next work the last 20 row as follows row 1 rs k3 i-cord p2tog k1 sl3 purlwise wyif i-cord 1 st decrease d row 2 ws k3 i-cord p1 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif i-cord row 3 k3 p1 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 4 k3 p1 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif work row 3 and 4 once more row 7 k3 k2tog sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d row 8 k3 p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 9 k3 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 10 k3 p1 sl3 purlwise wyif work row 9 and 10 once more row 13 k2 ssk sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d and there are 6 sts on your needles row 14 k3 sl3 purlwise wyif row 15 k3 sl3 purlwise wyif row 16 k3 sl3 purlwise wyif work row 15-16 twice more bobble tightly as follows k2 bobble 1 st on the rn by passing the second st over the first one k1 bobble 1 st on the rn *p1 bobble 1 st on the rn* repeat from * to * twice more break yarn and pull it through the last stitch to secure finishing weave in all yarn ends and wet block the scarf to finished measurements laying it flat to dry enjoy your new make contact and support for questions pattern support and other information please email aggie in stitches@gmail com i would love to admire your makes if you choose to share photos on social media please tag me @aggie_in_stitches in your photos and use hashtag #aurelisscarf this pattern is for personal use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way © agnes kroner 2025 aurelis scarf by aggie in stitches page 9 / 9 increases check sheet row 33-80 increases check sheet row 81-128 stitch right edge / stitch stitch
